alert.note: Alert for Furnas; Gosper (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 14 at 11:57PM CDT until June 15 at 12:30AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Gosper County in south central Nebraska... Furnas County in south central Nebraska... * Until 1230 AM CDT. * At 1156 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Wilsonville, or 22 miles east of McCook, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Wilsonville around 1200 AM CDT. Cambridge and Hendley around 1210 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Holbrook, Arapahoe and Edison. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
